Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.player.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard extends Object
Represents the board of a player in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    PlayerBoard(Player player)
    Constructs a player board with the given player.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard(Player player)
      Constructs a player board with the given player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to whom this board belongs.

  • Method Details

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements(ArrayList<CornerItem> cardRequirements)
      Checks if the player meets the requirements to play a card.
      Parameters:
      cardRequirements - The requirements of the card to be played.
      Returns:
      True if the player meets the requirements, false otherwise.

    • giveCardPoints

      public void giveCardPoints(PlayableCard c, int i, int j)
      Gives points to the player based on the type of card played.
      Parameters:
      c - The card being played.
      i - The x-coordinate of the card placement.
      j - The y-coordinate of the card placement.

    • checkObjective

      public int checkObjective(ObjectiveCard ob)
      Checks how many times the specified objective has been completed on the player's board.
      Parameters:
      ob - The objective card to check.
      Returns:
      The number of times the objective has been completed.

    • placeStartingCard

      public void placeStartingCard(StartingCard c, boolean face)
      Places a starting card on the player board at the center position. If the card is placed face-down, it rotates it to face-up before placing.
      Parameters:
      c - The starting card to be placed.
      face - True if the card is placed face-up, false if face-down.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(ResourceCard c, int i, int j, boolean face)
      Place a card on the player board at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      c - Card to be placed
      i - x coordinate
      j - y coordinate
      face - front or back of the card

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Retrieves the player associated with this player board.
      Returns:
      The player object.

    • getBoard

      public PlayableCard[][] getBoard()
      Retrieves the board containing playable cards.
      Returns:
      The 2D array representing the player board.

    • getAvailableItems

      public Map<CornerItem,Integer> getAvailableItems()
      Retrieves the map of available items on the player board.
      Returns:
      The map containing available items and their counts.

    • getPlayerBoardSubs

      public ArrayList<PlayerBoardSub> getPlayerBoardSubs()
      Retrieves the list of subscribers observing changes to this player board.
      Returns:
      The list of player board subscribers.

    • notifyChangePlayerBoard

      public void notifyChangePlayerBoard(String player, PlayableCard p, int i, int j)
      Notifies all subscribers of a change in the player board state.
      Parameters:
      player - The player making the change.
      p - The playable card being modified.
      i - The row index of the card on the board.
      j - The column index of the card on the board.
